title: Stop buying expensive smart phones
description: This is the Austin Evans Galaxy S20 review. The Samsung Galaxy S20 Ultra is a ridiculous monster of a smartphone.  Have you listenened to my new podcast yet?   How to waste $1000 on Amazon    Our second channel @thisis!  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
